text: Jonas Algirdas Antanaitis (19 August 1921 – 9 September 2018) was a Lithuanian politician. He was a long term member of Seimas. He was born in Rimšiniai village, Pakruojis district, Lithuania. He was arrested in 1944 and deported to Siberia. He returned to Lithuania in 1954, working as an engineer. In 1995, Antanaitis became a member of Seimas. Antanaitis died on 9 September 2018 at the age of 97.Mirė pasipriešinimo kovų dalyvis Jonas Algirdas Antanaitis ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Members of the Seimas
title: Jonas Algirdas Antanaitis
